entry.title: Not Until You Say Goodbye
entry.summary:
Author: Mat_Vibes

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,300Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 9

Summary: What if the end of the world wasn‚Äôt just about destruction‚Äîbut about love rewriting fate?In this story, Tim Drake is pulled into NERV, an organization that controls powerful mechs to fight off monstrous beings known as Angels. But saving the world is only half the battle‚Äîhe also has to deal with all sorts of problems, especially his love-struck brothers and his own complicated feelings.As Tim faces powerful enemies to protect humanity, love, trust, and heartbreak start to shift the story from a tale of survival to something more‚Äîsomething deeper. Because in a world where everything seems predetermined, can the love between two people be enough to change destiny itself?If you‚Äôre looking for an epic mix of high-stakes action, deep emotions, and a love story powerful enough to defy fate‚Äîthis is for you.

entry.title: Learning to Fly Again
entry.summary:
Author: CapricornCarnival

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,233Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 14

Summary: Dick has been assumed dead for years. A fact Jason cannot accept, the Court of Owls in on the rise, and Gotham is in danger. Jason must work with his remaining family to stop the threat of owls before he resumes his search for his long lost brother. What they don't expect is to find a monster that looks and sounds like Dick but won't accept the name. Something warped... something ageless. Jason must now protect this Talon from his family while he figures out how to help.

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,952Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 172

Summary: Babs' name flashes up on the screen and he groans; he told them all he was taking the night off and not to contact him for anything other than a planet ending emergency.He says as much as he answers the call."Turn on the news." Comes Babs' response, her voice sounding rougher than he's heard in a long time.It's exactly that which causes him to jolt forward and grab the TV remote, switching straight to the Gotham News Channel. His friends still had probes under their flesh and all life; Slade wouldn‚Äôt take them one, not until Dick was fully his Renegade. Bruce was, sorry? Could he really right this as the dark knight this time? Dick had fled, he‚Äôd done nothing of the bat‚Äôs teachings ‚Äìhe‚Äôd rejected all of it, all of it‚Ä¶Because, he wasn‚Äôt a hero right now. And Robin, his very best. Batman had issues with bonding over BEING the one to hold them together. There would be no more Titans or Robin if he said yes to his first guess.
